member.name: IAudioClientDuckingControl.SetDuckingOptionsForCurrentStream
member.summary: Sets the audio ducking options for an audio render stream. Allows an app to specify that the system shouldn't duck the audio of other streams when the app's audio render stream is active.
member.param: A value from the enumeration specifying the requested ducking behavior.
